All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
App
Class to connect Cafe94 system to JAVAFX Application libraries
AttendanceController
Controller class for managing reports in the system.
Basket
Class that manages all the items in a basket.
BasketController
ControlS functionalities of the basket pop up window.
BasketDataController
The class that manages all the data concerning Basket and item.
BasketLoader
The class that loads the basket from the database.
BasketView
Controls details of the selected items from the menu to the basket awaiting order placement
Chef
The class to represent a chef object.
CustomerController
The class that deals with Customer UI.
CustomerLoginController
Controllers customer login page
Data
Class that handles data management for a particular item.
DataManagement
The Data management class acting as an intermediary between the functionalities and the database.
DeliveryDriver
Handles all the details of a delivery driver.
Employee
Contains details of an employee (this excludes the manager).
Event
Class that manages all the events
Item
Class that represents actual menu items in CAFE94
LoginController
Controller for user log in page
LoginOrSignUpPageContoller
Controls functionalities of the Login or sign up page user interface.
Main
The Main class serves as the entry point for the application.
Manager
Class Containing details of the manager
ManagerController
Handles specified functionalities of the manager user interface.
MenuController
Controls functionality of the menu user interface.
MenuDataController
Handles all the data associated with the menu and menu controller
Order
Represents an order report containing a list of menu items.
OrderCard
A popup order card containing all items in an order
OrderHistory
Contains all the orders made by a specific customer.
Report
Represents a report containing a list of staff members and their hours worked.
ReportController
Controller class for managing reports in the system.
Result
The user interface that displays the result of attempted login.
SignUpController
Controlls the functionalities of the user signup page
Staff
Super class that instatiates the Staff this include the manager,chef,waiter and delivery driver.
StaffController
Controls the functionalities of the Staff user interface.
StaffDataController
Bridges the staff backend functionalities, staff user interface and staff database
StaffDetailsController
Handles the user interface of the staff portal for a specific selected staff account at a time
StaffLoginController
controls the login page of staff which is only accessed by the manager
StaffMemberController
class that controls the user interface of object Staff
UserData
Manages all the user data including customers and staff
Waiter
contains Waiter details.
